opinions: I recently dined at Nell'arte and was blown away by the quality of the food (I'm Italian) and service. From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was welcoming and comfortable. The staff was friendly and attentive, making sure that my dining experience was top-notch.  As for the pizza, it was absolutely delicious. I particularly enjoyed the Margherita pizza, which featured a perfect combination of mozzarella, tomato, and basil. All desserts looked absolutely irresistible too!  I highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a delicious and satisfying pizza experience in Paris!

We had the burrata to start and then a Pizza and Salad as the main - all dishes were delicious - in particular the bread was out of this world - the waiters were lovely and the price was fair. Would recommend!
Really good pizza and cocktail. Really beautiful interior decoration. I loved it Thank you ❤️❤️ I will definitely come back
Nice ambiance good cocktails and delicious pizza.very friendly staffs and generally I recommend it 100% :)
